headline: Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q1, Full-Year Outlook Slightly Exceeds Expectations
summary: Life sciences company Revvity (NYSE:RVTY) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 2.3% year on year to $664.8 million. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $2.85 billion at the midpoint came in 0.6% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.01 per share was 6.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $2.85 billion at the midpoint came in 0.6% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.01 per share was 6.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
